Stantler (TCG)

From Bulbapedia, the community-driven Pokémon encyclopedia.
Jump to navigationJump to search
← #0233: Porygon2
Pokémon
#0235: Smeargle →
For Pokémon TCG Pocket cards, see Stantler (TCG Pocket).

Stantler has been featured on 10 different cards since it debuted in the Neo Genesis expansion of the Pokémon Trading Card Game. Stantler cards are normally Colorless-type Basic Pokémon.

List of Pokémon cards featuring Stantler

Stantler
Cards listed with a blue background are only legal to use in the current Expanded format.
Cards listed with a green background are legal to use in both the current Standard and Expanded formats.
Card Type Mark English
Expansion 		Rarity # Japanese
Expansion 		Rarity #
Stantler Neo Genesis 76/111 Gold, Silver, to a New World...  
Stantler Neo Revelation 38/64 Awakening Legends  
Stantler Skyridge 102/144 Mysterious Mountains 068/088
Stantler EX Unseen Forces 32/115 Golden Sky, Silvery Ocean 086/106
Stantler Secret Wonders 113/132 Shining Darkness  
POP Series 7 9/17 Dialga LV.X Constructed Standard Deck    
Charizard & Ho-Oh ex Deck   016/034 Charizard & Ho-Oh ex Deck   016/032
Stantler Unleashed 64/95 HeartGold Collection 062/070
Stantler BREAKpoint 91/122 Rage of the Broken Heavens 067/080
Stantler Lost Thunder 156/214 Super-Burst Impact 069/095
Stantler Fusion Strike 208/264 Blue Sky Stream 055/067
        Start Deck 100   343/414
Stantler Astral Radiance 125/189 Battle Region 057/067


This article is part of Project TCG, a Bulbapedia project that aims to report on every aspect of the Pokémon Trading Card Game.
